short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a custom browser homepage for quick access to frequently used tools, links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension enables Hoomster app users to set the Hoomster dashboard URL as their browser homepage and seamlessly open new tabs without requiring browser confirmation.

Features:
- Hoomster New Tab: Automatically sets the Hoomster Dashboard URL as the default page whenever a new tab is opened.
- Open New Tab: Grants the Hoomster extension permission to open new tabs in your browser, a functionality used exclusively for the multi-search tool.
